players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated them last night and confirmed it."
Diana: "I'm not sure about Bob's claim; it seems too straightforward. Charlie, what's your side of the story?"
Charlie: "Charlie was my target last night. I'm not part of the mafia."
You: "I investigated Charlie and confirmed he's the mafioso. His denial is typical mafia deception—we must vote him out today."
Charlie: "I'm innocent, and I have no idea why Bob is accusing me. I suggest we listen to more evidence before making any decisions."
Diana: "I think Bob's claim seems more straightforward than Charlie's confusing statement, so we should vote for Charlie to be safe."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
